## Components
### Actionsheet_COM
``` js
import { Actionsheet } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing the component, use v-model for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">show-cancel</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing the cancel menu |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | cancel(取消) | text of cancel menu |
| <span class="prop-key">menus</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | {} | menu items, for example: `{menu1: 'some text'}`, menu name with `.noop` will not trigger click events |
| <span class="prop-key">close-on-clicking-mask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | if closing when clicking on mask |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu</span> |   (menuKey) | triggers when clicking on the menu |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-{menuKey}</span> |   (menuKey) | shortcut event for easier listening, you can listen on `on-click-menu-delete` if you have a menu named `delete` |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-cancel</span> |   &nbsp; | triggers when clicking on the cancel menu |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/actionsheet">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  更新到 vue@2.0，使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加属性 `close-on-clicking-mask`, 适用于强制选择的场景</span></li></ul>

### Cell_COM
``` js
import { Cell } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | label text |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | right text |
| <span class="prop-key">inline-desc</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | the text below title |
| <span class="prop-key">is-link</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if this is a link, if true, there will be an arrow on the right |
| <span class="prop-key">primary</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | title | main content area, can be in ['title', 'content'] |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | right area, you can use default slot instead of prop:value so you can use complexed layout |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | [deprecated] the same as default slot |
| <span class="prop-key">icon</span> | icon area before title |
| <span class="prop-key">after-title</span> | after title |
| <span class="prop-key">child</span> | the child element of the cell, you can add an element with absolute position |

### Scroller_COM
``` js
import { Scroller } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> |  | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">height</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">lockX</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">lockY</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">scrollbarX</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">scrollbarY</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">bounce</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">use-pulldown</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">use-pullup</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">pulldown-config</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | 见下面 | undefined |
| <span class="prop-key">pullup-config</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | 见下面 | undefined |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/scroller">进入demo页面</a>

pulldown 默认配置:

``` js
{
  content: 'Pull Down To Refresh',
  height: 60,
  autoRefresh: false,
  downContent: 'Pull Down To Refresh',
  upContent: 'Release To Refresh',
  loadingContent: 'Loading...',
  clsPrefix: 'xs-plugin-pulldown-'
}
```

pullup 默认配置:

``` js
{
  content: 'Pull Up To Refresh',
  pullUpHeight: 60,
  height: 40,
  autoRefresh: false,
  downContent: 'Release To Refresh',
  upContent: 'Pull Up To Refresh',
  loadingContent: 'Loading...',
  clsPrefix: 'xs-plugin-pullup-'
}
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何更新数据</span>

如果展示内容只是简单的增加或者减少，直接调用`reset`方法即可

``` js
this.$nextTick(() => {
  this.$refs.scroller.reset()
})
```

如果展示内容完全重载，那么需要主动设置位置让其能正确回到顶部。适用于改变筛选条件后重载数据的情况

``` js
this.$nextTick(() => {
  this.$refs.scroller.reset({
    top: 0
  })
})
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何设置pullup完成</span>

方法1，直接调用ref的`donePullup`方法

``` js
this.$refs.demo2.donePullup()
```

方法2，绑定value, 重置状态

<p class="tip">自定义pullup模板同样是用v-model来绑定以获取状态变化</p>

``` html
<scroller v-model="status"></scroller>
```

``` js
data () {
  return {
    status: {
      pullupStatus: 'default'
    }
  }
}
```

```
// 重置状态为default
this.status.pullupStatus = 'default
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何设置pulldown完成</span>

参照`pullup`, 使用方法`donePulldown`或者绑定`pulldownStatus`然后重置为`default`。

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何禁用或者启用pullup</span>

在有些情况下，比如数据不多不需要上拉加载或者已经加载完成，我们需要禁用pullup
同样可以调用方法 `disablePullup` 或者设置`pullupSatatus`为`disabled`

反之，则调用方法 `enalbePullup` 或者设置`pullupSatatus`为`enabled`

### Toast_COM

``` js
import { Toast } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing toast, use v-model for binding |

| <span class="prop-key">type</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | success | toast type, success, warn, cancel, text |
| <span class="prop-key">width</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | 7.6em | toast's width |
| <span class="prop-key">isShowMask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing mask, users cannot operate other elements on the page |
| <span class="prop-key">text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | content of the toast, text or html, the same function as default slot |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | default slot, the content of the toast |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-show</span> |   &nbsp; | emits when toast shows |
| <span class="prop-key">on-hide</span> |   &nbsp; | emits when toast hides |

<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认不显示遮罩</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加 isShowMask 属性</span></li></ul>

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">show-counter</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | if show the text length counter |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 0 | maxlength limit |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | textarea's value |
| <span class="prop-key">name</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | textarea's name |
| <span class="prop-key">placeholder</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | placeholder |
| <span class="prop-key">rows</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 3 | textarea's rows attribute |
| <span class="prop-key">cols</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 30 | textarea's cols attribute |
| <span class="prop-key">height</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 0 | height |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   `(value)` | triggers when value changes, params are (value) |
